header.title: Meghan Markle and Kate feud: Sarah Ferguson SPEAKS OUT on divide - 'Time to take a stand'
header.subtitle: SARAH Ferguson has written an open letter venting her anger at the “sewer” of social media and took a veiled swipe at the claims that Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle are sister-in-laws at war.
header.postText: The Duchess of York made a reference to women being “pitted against and compared with each other” in a most likely swipe at the media for the apparent feud between Meghan Markle and Kate Middleton. Meghan and the Duchess of Cambridge have faced months of rumours of a royal rift. These rumours were only heightened when Kensington Palace confirmed that Prince Harry and the Duchess of Sussex were moving away from London and over to Windsor.', 'She also revealed the way women are compared online reminds her of how she and Diana were presented as “rivals”.', 'The Duchess of York wrote in her open letter in Hello: “Take a look at any website, and you’ll see extraordinarily abusive comments aimed not only at people in the public eye but also other internet user.', '“Bullying, sniping, b***hing, even the most appalling sexism, racism and homophobia are commonplace - it seems that online, anything goes.', '“Women, in particular, are constantly pitted against and compared with each other in a way that reminds me of how people tried to portray Diana and me all the time as rivals, which is something neither of us ever really felt”.', 'She also wrote in the letter: “It’s time to confront head on the fact that much of social media has become a sewer.”', 'While Sarah acknowledged the internet could be a “force for good”, she insisted it is “time to take a stand” against online abuse.', 'The duchess has hundreds of thousands of followers on her Instagram and Twitter pages.', 'Sarah - who is patron of Street Child - regularly posts about her charity work as well as family updates.', 'No officials have ever confirmed that there is any rift between the Duchess of Sussex and the Duchess of Cambridge or Prince Harry and William.

commentThread.commentText: Something something about staying in your own lane, Sarah.

Anything to have the spotlight back on her. Whilst I agree with her sentiments...she has consistently used media...especially in the US ...to spout off about her innocent ex husband, various acts of charity etc. But when she is questioned about her own errors in judgment. cash for access to Andrew...told everyone to back the hell off. The woman NEVER has taken responsibility for her own behavior...and has NEVER learned from her mistakes.

Media has to stop this troll level from Megan's family, stop paying them for scanned copies, stop photographing them, stop paying them. Load of vultures and the sad thing is they will even use their grandchild/niece/nephew/cousin to cash in, It doesn't matter where in the world the media is just stop paying cash to this low life

Who is an ex-member of the royal family to comment publicly and call for action. Sarah would do well to remember she was not a raving success and shoots her mouth off in stupid ways just like Harry and Diana did.
When the Queen goes this family should be dismantled and the UK made a Republic.
Attention seeking Ferguson, now I know this feud's a load of bull...t

The last thing the Royal family needs at this time are comments from a discredited adulterer famed for her liking of having her toes sucked and running up substantial debts let alone trying to sell access to her ex-husband Prince Andrew for substantial fees.
Oh for goodness sake, I thought that this awful woman had disappeared from our radar!Is she re - surfacing now that Philip is so old that she thinks his opposition to her will be short lived!
Wonder if the rest of the in-laws will now speak out!
Why is Sarah getting into this?
Ironic in extreme...Truth hurts.

What’s with this person jumping on bandwagon?  She would sell her mother for a few quid, judging by her behaviour when she was caught hustling with reporters in hotel room.  She sees opportunity to get a bit of publicity,  Too many hangers on in RF.  with too much to say.  Totally fed up with them, they should shut up and stick their noses out instead of fuelling fire.

replies.commentText: Social media is ok to celebrities as long as they can do whatever they want and followers Fawn over them, regardless.

commentThread.commentText: I couldn't agree more with Sarah, I am sick to death of newspapers continually digging up imaginary conflicts between the two royal couples,  just leave them alone for goodness sake and get a life.
I can't stop laughing at the irony of that headline.
Sarah please keep your opinions to yourself instead of fueling the fire.  You were an utter embarrassment to the RF in your day and now history is repeating itself!!!

Are you for real???? so you are allowed to say what you want but not her? Sarah is so right about social media being a sewer, you just have to look on here and go no further to prove that..
Sarah, you are persona non grata in the UK. Please go back to obscurity...you are an embarrassment.
Oh! You most perfect person, what are your skeletons I wonder.
